programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if realtime audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o wgflute.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
kfreq = 440 kjet init p4 ;vary air jet iatt = 0.1 idetk = 0.1 kngain = 0.15 kvibf = 5.925 kvamp = 0.05
asig wgflute .8, kfreq, kjet, iatt, idetk, kngain, kvibf, kvamp, 1 outs asig, asig
endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore> f 1 0 16384 10 1 ;sine wave
i 1 0 2 0.02 ;more air jet i 1 + 2 0.32 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
